name: Castle Coin Dozer Story - Diamond, Dragon, and Jewel Prizes Mania (HD)
name_original: Castle Coin Dozer Story - Diamond, Dragon, and Jewel Prizes Mania (HD)
description:
Bulldoze your way to royal riches with Tiny Pocket Dozer! Use the Coin Castle’s bulldozing drawbridge to push gold coins, bonus gems and blue dragons of fortune into your coin hopper. Watch out, because the more coins you drop, the greater the chance your coins will fall off the edge of oblivion!

Very Addicting!

Features:
Hard core coin-dropping strategy
Multi-coin and Dragon Gem bonuses
Casual game play

Unlock more coins!
developers: Sizzle Entertainment: The Best Fun Free Cool Apps and Top Addicting Games
publishers: SIZZLE ENTERTAINMENT: THE BEST FUN FREE COOL APPS AND TOP ADDICTING GAMES
